description: Re-enables a disabled AMI. The re-enabled AMI is marked as available and can be used for instance launches, appears in describe operations, and can be shared. Amazon Web Services accounts, organizations, and Organizational Units that lost access to the AMI when it was disabled do not regain access automatically. Once the AMI is available, it can be shared with them again. Only the AMI owner can re-enable a disabled AMI. For more information, see Disable an AMI in the Amazon EC2 User Guide.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: Returns true if the request succeeds; otherwise, it returns an error.
